name: Offworld
description:
Epic aerial combat featuring airships! Also explosions!

Offworld is a single player third person shooter where players pilot an airship and fight for the dominion of their chosen clan!

Features
  • Epic air ships that battle each other for eternal glory!
  • Tactical gameplay with three ship types and various weapons to choose from!
  • A beautifully created stylized 3d world!
  • Arcade style gameplay designed to have fun!
  • Beautifully composed music!
History of Offworld

Initially, Offworld was designed and created by friends during their internships in 2012 because they loved making games and game art wanted to create something awesome. During this adventure there were never any thoughts of publishing this game.

After hearing about the Indievelopment 2013 contest at the last moment they scrambled to submit Offworld and were surprised to hear that it had earned third prize! This inspired some team members to start Tengu Games. After releasing their debut game Elementalist for mobile devices they came back to their first: Offworld.

After a good overhaul of the graphics, weapon systems and adding bigger explosions Offworld is now available, at the cost of just your soul! (Or pay what you want!)
